episode: When my cousin turned 50, the family got together and he got married not long after.  Was good to all catch up.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: When my cousin turned 50, the family got together and he got married not long after.  Was good to all catch up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a wonderful celebration!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was.  Some of the family I've not seen for a while.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nice to reconnect with loved ones.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, remembering past events and catching up on what we have been doing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Must have brought back some great memories.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: <name> and his wife looked amazing at the wedding.  <name> got emotional at the big moment as well.  He is a family guy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Aww, that's so sweet!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He will do anything for his family.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A true family man, admirable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He is different to his sister, who I see far less of.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Guess some family members drift apart.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Her ex was not a socialable person so she never came to any family dos.  That may change now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe a fresh start for her now.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hopefully as she always enjoys the occasions when she comes out.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad to hear she has a good time.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hard to believe they are both in their 50's.  We are getting old.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Time flies, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It does.  Can't believe I'm in my 40's.  I don't feel that old.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're still young at heart!
